1.2.1.title: New Characters
1.2.1.description: Added missing characters and new 5.8 character.

1.2.0.title: Character Management Enhancements
1.2.0.description: Added character export functionality and improved character filtering options.
changes: Added ability to export character settings to JSON file.
Added new toggle controls to enable/disable all characters.
Added separate toggles for 4-star and 5-star characters.
Improved character filtering UI with dropdown menu.

1.1.0.title: Language System Update
1.1.0.description: Improved language system integration and character list updates.
changes: Enhanced language system to prevent untranslated text from flashing during page load.
fixes: Added missing character 'Tartaglia' to the character list.

1.0.0.title: Initial Release
1.0.0.description: This is the initial release of the app.
changes: Added a new feature to import characters from a JSON file.
fixes: Fixed a bug where only the last character was being selected after randomizing.
